column1: #Text=" Azula says : " Then would n't it make it more interesting if you removed the net ?
#Text=" Shuzumu says : " Uh ... the thing is ... the performers ... " Azula says : " You 're right , you 're right .
#Text=Ooh , what kind of dangerous animals do you have ?
#Text=" Shuzumu says : " Well , our circus boasts the most exotic assortment - " Azula says : " Release them all !
#Text=" Yung says : " We 've got a problem .
#Text=" Yung says : " No , we have an extra .
